T02D1438:237b-1: shr'i dvi bhu dza sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
T02D1438:237b-3: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1438:237b-4: dpal bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1438:237b-5: bdag gi dge bas khams gsum srid mtha'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
T02D1438:237b-6: bsal nas bde ba mtha' dag la ni dgod par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1438:237b-7: sangs rgyas thob par bgyi'o zhes kyang smon pa bskyed nas su //
T02D1438:237b-8: gzhan dag 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yang ni yongs su spel bar bya //
T02D1438:237b-9: rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste //
T02D1438:237b-10: byin gyis brlab dang rab brtag dang //
T02D1438:237b-11: bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1438:237b-12: rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
T02D1438:237b-13: gang yang skad cig sbyor ba yis //
T02D1438:237b-15: rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can bzhin //
T02D1438:237b-16: sa bon med par bsgom bya ste //
T02D1438:237b-17: dpral bar gnas pa'i thong phreng can //
T02D1438:237b-18: zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'chang //
T02D1438:237b-19: phyag rgya drug dang mgo phreng can //
T02D1438:237b-20: spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can //
T02D1438:237b-21: g-yas brkyang gom stabs bkod pa yis //
T02D1438:237b-22: sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la //
T02D1438:237b-23: gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas //
T02D1438:237b-24: mnan cing stag gi pags pa 'chang //
T02D1438:237b-25: nag po mi bskyod cod pan can //
T02D1438:237b-26: rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan //
T02D1438:237b-27: dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni //
T02D1438:237b-28: rdo rje thod pa khrag bkang bsnams //
T02D1438:237b-29: dmar po ska rags dum bus mtshan //
T02D1438:237b-30: spyan gsum mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
T02D1438:237b-31: phyag rgya lnga ma skra grol ma //
T02D1438:237b-32: phyogs gos sangs rgyas dbu brgyan ma //
T02D1438:237b-33: de ltar skad cig gis rdzogs par //
T02D1438:237b-34: bdag gis lus ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1438:237b-35: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //
T02D1438:237b-37: sems kyi spyod yul gcig tu ni //
T02D1438:237b-38: de dag kho na yun ring bsam //
T02D1438:238a-2: de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba brtsam //
T02D1438:238a-3: chos dbyings rgyal mtshan kun chags las //
T02D1438:238a-4: dman min 'dzag pa phun tshogs rnams //
T02D1438:238a-5: yang dag rig pa dga' ba'i tshogs //
T02D1438:238a-7: de ni rgya chen yid byed pa //
T02D1438:238a-9: rtag tu bsgom zhing 'di bzhin du //
T02D1438:238a-10: 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya //
T02D1438:238a-11: sna tshogs mtsho skyes nyi ma dang ni 'jigs byed dus mtshan mo //
T02D1438:238a-12: mdzes ma bdag po nam mkha'i nor bu de bzhin gshegs lnga yi //
T02D1438:238a-13: lus dang yan lag mchog dang 'od dkar thig le n'a da ste //
T02D1438:238a-14: 'di rnams sgrib pa med pa'i gnas su rim gyis gzhug par bya //
T02D1438:238a-15: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02D1438:238a-16: kun nas yal bar 'gyur ba ni //
T02D1438:238a-17: de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
T02D1438:238a-18: yang dag yang du gzhug par bya //
T02D1438:238a-19: thams cad khyab pa snang ba med //
T02D1438:238a-20: snying rje ro gcig yid kyis ni //
T02D1438:238a-21: bdag po yin bzhin stong pa nyid //
T02D1438:238a-23: rnam bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab de yis 'khyud pa po //
T02D1438:238a-24: skye 'jig spangs ba mi 'gyur bde ba dgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs pa po //
T02D1438:238a-25: sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed byed sku gsum ldan pa khams gsum yang dag rig pa po //
T02D1438:238a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1438:238a-27: mi 'gyur ba bde ba ye shes dus //
T02D1438:238a-28: thabs dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1438:238a-30: shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid do //
T02D1438:238a-31: kam de bde ba rgyu med blo //
T02D1438:238a-32: snying rje ye shes mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1438:238a-33: stod nyid pra ti se na bzhin //
T02D1438:238a-34: dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o //
T02D1438:238a-35: kun nas phyag dang zhabs ldan pa //
T02D1438:238a-36: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
T02D1438:238a-37: kun nas dran ldan 'jig rten du //
T02D1438:238a-38: thams cad kun du g-yogs nas bzhugs //
T02D1438:238a-39: 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
T02D1438:238a-40: stong nyid snying rje gnyis med pa //
T02D1438:238a-41: ma ning zhes byar grags pa ste //
T02D1438:238a-43: sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi ni //
T02D1438:238a-44: phung po la sogs 'di na gnas //
T02D1438:238a-45: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di //
T02D1438:238a-46: thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid yin no //
T02D1438:238b-0: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa lhan cig @238b skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1438:238b-1: dngos grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po dpal rdo
T02D1438:238b-2: rje dril bu pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1438:238b-4: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig pan chen
T02D1438:238b-5: grub pa brnyes pa rje btsun ratna rakshi ta'i zhal
T02D1438:238b-6: snga nas dang / chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge
